languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс наклоняется к клетке — на достаточном расстоянии, чтобы мутант не дотянулся до него.{/n} "С кем ты говоришь? Кто и что обещал тебе?"
{n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс наклоняется к клетке — на достаточном расстоянии, чтобы мутант не дотянулся до него.{/n} "С кем ты говоришь? Кто и что обещал тебе?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"
{n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"
{n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"
{n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

languages.text: {n}海因里希朝笼子靠了过去，但保持着一定距离，确保变异生物触碰不到他。{/n}“你在和谁说话？那个人向你承诺了什么？那个人是谁？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希朝笼子靠了过去，但保持着一定距离，确保变异生物触碰不到他。{/n}“你在和谁说话？那个人向你承诺了什么？那个人是谁？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia la jaula, aunque mantiene una distancia prudencial para que la mutante no pueda llegar a él.{/n} «¿Con quién hablas? ¿Qué te prometió? ¿Y quién es?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se inclina hacia la jaula, aunque mantiene una distancia prudencial para que la mutante no pueda llegar a él.{/n} «¿Con quién hablas? ¿Qué te prometió? ¿Y quién es?».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは檻のほうに身を乗り出したが、変異体に届かないよう、十分な距離をとっていた。{/n}「誰と話している？奴らは何を約束した？その相手は誰だ？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは檻のほうに身を乗り出したが、変異体に届かないよう、十分な距離をとっていた。{/n}「誰と話している？奴らは何を約束した？その相手は誰だ？」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich zu dem Käfig, aber mit ausreichend Abstand, sodass der Mutant ihn nicht erreichen kann.{/n} "Mit wem sprecht Ihr? Was wurde Euch versprochen? Wer hat Euch etwas versprochen?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beugt sich zu dem Käfig, aber mit ausreichend Anstand, sodass der Mutant ihn nicht erreichen kann.{/n} "Mit wem sprecht Ihr? Was wurde Euch versprochen? Wer hat Euch etwas versprochen?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se penche vers la cage, tout en restant suffisamment loin pour que la mutante ne puisse pas le toucher.{/n} « À qui parlez-vous ? Qui vous a promis quoi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se penche vers la cage, tout en restant suffisamment loin pour que la mutante ne puisse pas le toucher.{/n} « À qui parlez-vous ? Qui vous a promis quoi ? »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, mutantın uzanamayacağı bir mesafeden kafese doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Kiminle konuşuyorsun? Ne sözü verdiler sana? Sözü verenler kim?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix leans toward the cage, but at sufficient distance to ensure that the mutant cannot reach him.{/n} "Who are you talking to? What did they promise you? Who are they?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, mutantın uzanamayacağı bir mesafeden kafese doğru eğiliyor.{/n} “Kiminle konuşuyorsun? Ne sözü verdiler sana? Sözü verenler kim?”
